column2: When you are using the Internet, how often do you see any ads or promotions for cigarettes or other tobacco products?
column17: A = I do not use the Internet (Go to Q7)

column2: Overall, how often do you use the Internet?
Do you have a Facebook, Google Plus, MySpace, Twitter, or other social networking account?
column10: ASK: Respondents who have access to the internet (Q2 = NE 7, -8 or -7)

column2: How often do you visit your Facebook, Google Plus, MySpace, Twitter, or other social networking account?
column10: ASK: Respondents who have a Facebook or other social networking account (Q3 = 1).

column2: Has anyone discussed tobacco products on your Facebook, Google Plus, MySpace, Twitter, or other social networking account?
column10: ASK: Respondents who have a Facebook or other social networking account (Q3 = 1).

column2: In the past 6 months, have you ever signed up for e-mail alerts about tobacco products, read articles online about tobacco products, or watched a video online about tobacco products?
column10: ASK: Respondents who have access to the internet (Q2 = NE 7, -8 or -7)

column2: During the past 30 days, did a tobacco company send you information (other than coupons) through ... (CHOOSE ALL THAT APPLY)
column21: E = I did not receive any information from a tobacco company

column2: In the past 6 months, did a tobacco company send you any information other than coupons?
How did a tobacco company send you any information other than coupons? Choose all that apply.
column10: ASK: Respondents who have received information (Q6 = 1).
column20: 4 = Social Networks (such as Facebook and Twitter)
